msbt.message: Hey, what's up? I don't think we've met. My name's . What's yours, ?, huh? Where you from?<10_4 /> ? Cool, cool. You here for some R & R too?This little island's great. It's so nice being able to chill out in the middle of absolutely nowhere.Anyway, I'll let you soak up the peace in, uhpeace. Take care!

Yo! How's it going? Have we met? I'm .Gotta say, I had no idea what I was gonna get on this trip. But changing up the pace is its own reward, right?Anyway, this little place is so calm. Really lets me get my head straight— exactly what I needed, .Alright, that's enough outta me. You take care, and I'll get back to staring at that gorgeous horizon.

Well, if it ain'twait, do I know you? Hey, I'm . How's it going, ?So, am I the only one who was hopin' for more—I don't know—adventure on this adventure?I mean it's super peaceful and all, but I kinda wanted something worth partying about when I got back.Oh well. That's on me.<10_4 /> It's still cool to just sit and be calm now and then. That's important too.
This place is fun and all, but I don't know. I think I need to shake things up, .Maybe a day on an empty-ish island is aiming too low Maybe I need to REALLY get away!
You too, huh? Yeah, it's tough to break a pattern. But don't worry, we've both got this.Yeah, I think it's about time I started looking for a new place to live Thanks for listening.

Cuttin' right to it, huh? You sure you want someone like me around? Also, where're you from, anyway?Oh, ! I think I've heard of it. Is it nice there?You know, I think a move might be exactly what I need to drag myself out of my rut.Plus I'll have you around to introduce me to everyone and show me where the cool parties are and stuff!

Bwa ha ha! Alright, you're on!Wow! I totally didn't expect to make any huge decisions all the way out here, but that's fate for you!Guess I got some paperwork to do Who do I need to talk to about that?Tom Nook, huh? Cool, I'll bug him and get that rock rollin'. Be there soon, !

There's ALL KINDS of cool stuff here. Honestly, I don't even know what half these things are, .Well, I'm not waiting. I'm grabbing up everything I can carry. I can figure out what to do with it all later.
The terrain here's really neat. Makes me wonder how this island formed. After the "lots of lava" part, that is.

Check it out. I get on the plane to come here, make myself all comfy, we start to take offand I panic.Yeah, turned out I left all my stuff for this trip back at home, . But actually it's alright, becauseA minute ago I asked that Wilbur guy if he had any tools I could borrow, and he whipped out a whole shop!Let this be a lesson—don't be like me. But just in case you ARE like me, you can bug Wilbur to bail you out.
Is it weird that I kinda can't wait to get home and start packing?OK, yeah, that IS weird. I mean, who likes packing? But I really can't wait to move to !
What a day! I came out here for some peace and quiet and hangin' out on a secluded island, Now I'm about to uproot myself and plant down somewhere new. Ain't life wild!
The more I think about it, the more hyped up I'm getting to move.If folks on 're even half as cool as you, this is so gonna rock, !
